title: Name
body: Im wanna change my name to Trax but someone else is using it but it seems like they have been inactive for 1 and a half seasons. Is there any way I could get it or....?

replies.body: Each account is protected by the summoner name clean, and has a solid amount of time before it can be changed for inactivity.  More info is also available through our[ name clean up ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751914-Summoner-Name-Clean-Up-)guide, but keep in mind that we don't have info to offer on when a name could become available.  Let me know if that clears things up!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=uKT4AW0a,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-04-13T15:50:47.848+0000)
>
> Each account is protected by the summoner name clean, and has a solid amount of time before it can be changed for inactivity.  More info is also available through our[ name clean up ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751914-Summoner-Name-Clean-Up-)guide, but keep in mind that we don't have info to offer on when a name could become available.  Let me know if that clears things up!

Yes thank you
